title: Ticket #7175: ignore comments on job_queue.log end transaction events
description:
in 8.9.4, the Schedd may write comments into the EndTransaction events in the job_queue.log. The log reader code for 8.8 should ignore these comments and not treat them as log corruption.

An end transaction event my be optionally followed by a #, in which case the log reader code should scan to the end of the line and treat that whole line as a comment to be ignored.
